title: Roommates
description: Performing user-research and competitive analysis on applications for enabling secure monetary transactions.
Creating low-fidelity mockups on user-flows detailing the scope of the app, general navigation and app-themes.
Incorporating CV ML frameworks to enable receipt parsing and automatic itemization of shared costs.

Researching and developing centralized framework enabling secure transactions between any 3rd-party financial application and banking institutions in React Native; creating efficient money-splitter and room manager.

title: WriteGirl
description: Developed a full-stack mobile application (React Native) for non-profit organization 'WriteGirl' to empower underserved youth writers to develop creative writing with features like writing activities, prompt randomizers, and pep talks.
Implemented authenticated, persistent user data using SecureStore with Redux and protected routes using PassportJS to push serialized sensitive user data into MongoDB.
Collaborated in agile development setting with 12 developers and designers to create deliverables consistent with WriteGirl's mission and branding.
Developed docs/support materials for non-profit clients to enable independent maintenance of project solutions.

title: MiniJava Compiler
description: Constructed LL(1) language token parser in Java to verify program validity in single-pass file scans by generating and processing abstract syntax trees for lexical analysis.
Implemented comprehensive object-oriented type-checker to perform static analysis by designing symbol table management systems to track identifiers and associated scopes, enhancing error detection.
Developed linear-scan register allocation heuristic via liveness analysis on variables using the Visitor strategy.
Developed intermediate representation (IR) code generation routines to transpile directly into RISC-V language.

title: Planit
description: Integrated React.js app with SeatGeek/Yelp API to schedule user itineraries based on geographic location.
Implemented responsive, interactive calendar enabling clearing, rescheduling, resizing and drag-to-reschedule features, displaying a week-view to plan with and interact with live events.
Enabled .ics export to allow any personalized itinerary schedule to be added to any third-party calendar app.

title: Unhinged
description: Constructed a matchmaking project (C++), based on self-described attributes to efficiently match individuals across upwards to 1,000,000+ other candidates through user profiles.
Designed and incorporated a radix-tree implementation for highly space efficient data storage in large user databases to optimize queries for ideal candidates and matches with low latency searches.
